code: import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import Navbar from'../components/Navbar';import CountryCard from'../components/Card';import TotalCard from'../components/TotalCard';import{filterCountry}from'../redux/countries/countries';import Filter from'../components/Filter';import africa from'../components/images/africa.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Home=function Home(){var countries=useSelector(function(state){return state.countriesReducer.continent;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var total=0;if(countries){countries.forEach(function(element){total+=element.All.confirmed;});}var handleFilter=function handleFilter(value){dispatch(filterCountry(value));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{title:"Covid19 confirmed cases",left:"2021"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center justify-content-evenly px-2 py-3 main-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:africa,alt:"map of africa",className:"africa-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TotalCard,{name:"AFRICA",total:total,className:"fs-2"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center justify-content-around filter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"STATS BY COUNTRY"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Filter,{handleFilter:handleFilter})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex flex-wrap",children:countries&&countries.map(function(country){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CountryCard,{country:country},country.All.country);})})]})]});};export default Home;
